content:
Last week we announced [official support for Server-Side Rendering in Aurelia](blog/2018/02/25/server-side-rendering). This week we're announcing an update to our Webpack tooling to support Webpack 4.0! We've also got a number of incremental fixes and small new features for other Aurelia libraries, detailed below.

## Major Releases

Major updates may include breaking changes, new features, fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### aurelia-webpack-plugin 3.0.0-rc.1

We've updated our Webpack plugin to support Webpack 4.0! Please note that because of breaking changes in Webpack's plugin model, we cannot support Webpack 2.0/3.0 with this plugin. If you cannot migrate to Webpack 4.0, then you will need to continue using aurelia-webpack-plugin 2.0.0-rc.5.

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-ui-virtualization 1.0.0-beta.3.3.0](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/compare/1.0.0-beta.3.2.0...v1.0.0-beta.3.3.0)

#### Features

* **VirtualRepeat:** handle null / undefined, empty collection ([6f92c31](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/6f92c31))

### [aurelia-pal 1.6.0](https://github.com/aurelia/pal/compare/1.5.0...v1.6.0)

#### Features

* **dom:** add NodeList to global ([701dc34](https://github.com/aurelia/pal/commit/701dc34))

#### Bug Fixes

* **index:** Fixed missing injectStyles param description ([8b0204d](https://github.com/aurelia/pal/commit/8b0204d))

### [aurelia-pal-browser 1.6.0](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-browser/compare/1.4.0...v1.6.0)

#### Features

* **dom:** add NodeList to global ([#31](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-browser/issues/31)) ([16cd315](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-browser/commit/16cd315))

### [aurelia-pal-nodejs 1.0.0-beta.3.1.0](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-nodejs/compare/1.0.0-beta.3.0.0...1.0.0-beta.3.1.0)

#### Features

* **dom:** add NodeList to global ([20ce260](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-nodejs/commit/20ce260))

#### Bug Fixes

* **global:** add missing interface element to fix compile errors ([fa2bbd3](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-nodejs/commit/fa2bbd3))

## Patch Releases

Patch updates include only fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-templating-binding 1.4.1](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-binding/compare/1.4.0...v1.4.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **syntax-interpreter:** use the hyphenated name ([4e4c427](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-binding/commit/4e4c427)), closes [#122](https://github.com/aurelia/templating-binding/issues/122)

### [history-browser 1.1.1](https://github.com/aurelia/history-browser/compare/1.1.0...v1.1.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **history-browser:** Add location.href to replaceState() call ([424c252](https://github.com/aurelia/history-browser/commit/424c252))

### [aurelia-i18n 2.1.2](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/compare/2.1.1...2.1.2)

#### Bug Fixes

* **i18n:** stop forcing lng option ([#259](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/issues/259)) ([5692e30](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/commit/5692e30))

### [aurelia-hot-module-reload 0.2.1](https://github.com/aurelia/hot-module-reload/compare/0.2.0...v0.2.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **hmr:** modules from transpilers do not use the 'css-resource-plugin' ([#17](https://github.com/aurelia/hot-module-reload/issues/17)) ([c6475d8](https://github.com/aurelia/hot-module-reload/commit/c6475d8)), closes [#16](https://github.com/aurelia/hot-module-reload/issues/16)

### [aurelia-middleware-koa 0.1.1](https://github.com/aurelia/middleware-koa/compare/0.1.0...0.1.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **typings:** Correct typings file path ([ccffe36](https://github.com/aurelia/middleware-koa/commit/ccffe36))

### [aurelia-ssr-bootstrapper-webpack 0.1.1](https://github.com/aurelia/ssr-bootstrapper-webpack/compare/0.1.0...0.1.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **README:** Fix typos ([700af15](https://github.com/aurelia/ssr-bootstrapper-webpack/commit/700af15))
* **start:** wait for two-way bindings ([5264e49](https://github.com/aurelia/ssr-bootstrapper-webpack/commit/5264e49))
* **typescript-metadata:** declare Element types ([6030034](https://github.com/aurelia/ssr-bootstrapper-webpack/commit/6030034))
